moves.name: Hurricane
moves.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Snarl
moves.description: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.

moves.name: Oblivion Wing
moves.description: The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Focus Blast
moves.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.
